name: O-Sim 22
description:
THIS IS A SCHOOL PROJECT ONLY!
An orienteering simulator for all runners who want to test their skills digitally and for those who want to try the sport once. In O-Sim 22 you can test your skills on the map "Sichtern" with the game modes Easy, Medium, Hard and BikeOL. As a support you have a compass and a map. When you are close enough to a post, the post is automatically triggered and there is a split time. At the finish you will see all the split times, the final time and if you found all the posts. In BikeOL mode you can even do orienteering with a mountain bike. What are you waiting for? Download O-Sim 22 for free now and become a virtual orienteer!
